name: tutor-assistant
description: manage student data and provide email templates for all processes

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.seed: cd server && npm run seed && cd ../
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: samuel fox & daniel soledad
